text: Deptford Bridge is a light metro station on the Docklands Light Railway (DLR) Bank-Lewisham Line. It is in Deptford, south-east London. The station is elevated above both local roads and Deptford Creek. It is next to Lewisham College and Deptford market. The station is between Greenwich and Elverson Road stations. It is on the boundary of Travelcard Zone 2 and 3. Category:Docklands Light Railway stations Category:Transport in the Royal Borough of Greenwich Category:Buildings and structures in the Royal Borough of Greenwich
title: Deptford Bridge DLR station
